title: Halprin: collective creativity
brief_description: Lawrence Halprin, environmental designer, explains his successful approach designing cities for the care and feeding of people, rather than the care and feeding of automobiles. His “take part” workshops draw people together to create their own consensus of how they want their cities to change or be revitalised
